item.description:
TC: Sharon (srozines@yahoo.com or 508-879-9433)

EVENT: Enjoy an afternoon of wildflowers at Garden in the Woods, the headquarters and botanic garden of the New England Wild Flower Society. We will wander along the trails and enjoy the installations of the feature exhibit, "ART GOES WILD: Innovation with Native Plants." If the group is interested, we will start with the Garden's guided tour at 2 pm. Optional stop for ice cream or snack afterwards.
MEET: 1:45 PM at the Visitor Center of Garden in the Woods, 180 Hemenway Road, North Framingham, MA. Directions at: http://www.newengland.... Contact TC to facilitate carpooling, or to arrange pick-up from the Framingham commuter rail station (train arriving 1:27 PM).
RSVP: Recommended to Sharon, the trip's coordinator at address listed above, it is required if requesting pick-up from rail station.
COST: $7 Garden admission + $5 non-members + money for snack afterwards Rain cancels
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the trip's coordinator for details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: WILDFLOWER WANDERING
